akn:content.akn:p:
§ 60608. Space weather benchmarks The interagency working group established under section 60601(c) shall periodically review and update the benchmarks described in the report of the National Science and Technology Council entitled “Space Weather Phase 1 Benchmarks” and dated June 2018, as necessary, based on—(1) any significant new data or advances in scientific understanding that become available; or
(2) the evolving needs of entities impacted by space weather phenomena.
(Pub. L. 116–181, § 2(b), Oct. 21, 2020, 134 Stat. 892.)
(1) any significant new data or advances in scientific understanding that become available; or
(2) the evolving needs of entities impacted by space weather phenomena.
